author: dlr
msg: svntest: Do away with negative predicate is_non_posix_os(), and
introduce a new SkipUnless TestCase wrapper.
(Skip): Update doc string to reflect change to lambda acceptance.
(Skip.conditional): New API to Invoke SELF.cond_func(), and return
the result evaluated against the expected value.
(SkipUnless): New sub-class of Skip.  Requires a lambda function.
(test_list): Use SkipUnless, and replace usage of

author: hwright
msg: Add an XFail'ing test for 'svn log -g' on copying revisions.

author: glasser
msg: When a test tries to create a config directory, save the server config
in the file with the correct name.  (No test actually tries to put
custom data in the servers file right now, though.)

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r25390, fix clean serf only build with --without-neon.
(WinGeneratorBase._find_neon): Even if neon can be found don't bother
trying (or recording that it exits) if --without-neon was passed in.

author: hwright
msg: (svn_fs_new): Fix spelling error in doc string.
